education.title: Diploma 1 and 2 in Marketing and Communication
Advance Diploma in Front-End and Audio-Visual

recommendations.name: Victor Emmanuel Jr Estilo
recommendations.recommendation: Diego has shown immense potential when given the opportunity during his tenure. He has proven that he is a quick learner as he transitioned smoothly from a designer into a front end developer. His positive attitude and thirst for knowledge is what contributed greatly to his growth. He is always quick to jump on tasks and assist others.

recommendations.name: Gertjan (Ben) Hondebrink
recommendations.recommendation: I worked with Diego at True Alliance and his optimism was amazing. He was consistently eager to tackle new challenges, always delivered and was a great team player. I’m certain he’ll bring that same energy and commitment to his next role!.

recommendations.name: Frontend Web Developer | Web Producer | CMS & eCommerce Specialist | Salesforce Commerce Cloud, React
recommendations.recommendation: Working with Diego has been a real pleasure. He’s a front end developer with a great sense for design and a sharp attention to detail. Diego approaches each project with a positive attitude and handles challenges with confidence. He's someone you can always count on.
